param.name: search_modules_type_1
param.label: Search Html Modules
param.description: Search in html modules (module=mod_custom). CPU Usage: Low

param.name: search_modules_type_2
param.label: Search Cached Modules
param.description: Search in non html but cached modules (module <> mod_custom and cache = 1). CPU Usage: Medium

param.name: search_modules_type_3
param.label: Search Non Cached Modules
param.description: Search in non html and non cached modules (module <> mod_custom and cache=0 or cache property not defined). CPU Usage: Medium/High depending on the module complexity - Offline/Local testing required before turning this option on.

param.name: process_cached_modules
param.label: Process Cached Modules
param.description: Process cached modules if cache not found or cache not activated. CPU Usage: Medium/High depending on the module complexity - Offline/Local testing required before turning this option on.

param.name: search_modules_positions
param.label: Search Modules Positions
param.description: Inclusive - Comma-separated list of modules positions (e.g.: user1, user2, left). Leave this field empty if you want to search in all modules positions.

param.name: no_search_modules
param.label: No Search Modules
param.description: Exclusive - Comma-separated list of modules names (e.g.: mod_mainmenu, mod_breadcrumbs, mod_wrapper). Leave this field empty if you want to search in all modules names.

param.name: no_search_modules_ids
param.label: No Search Modules Ids
param.description: Exclusive - Comma-separated list of modules ids (e.g.: 12, 3, 45). Leave this field empty if you want to search in all modules ids.

param.name: groupby_moduleid
param.label: Groupby Module Id
param.description: If set to yes, only one page per module will be returned in the search results (the page with the smallest Itemid).

param.name: show_module_frequency
param.label: Show Module Frequency
param.description: Append the number of menu item(s) per module to the section sub-title. IMPORTANT: Only applicable when the groupby_moduleid is set to yes.

param.name: include_assigned_all_modules
param.label: Include Assigned All Modules
param.description: Set this parameter to yes if you want to include the modules shown on all menu items in the search scope. IMPORTANT: This is actually not a very good idea unless the groupby_moduleid parameter is set to yes too.

param.name: search_limit
param.label: Search Limit
param.description: Number of search items to return
